data.eml:eml: Notes on Eotrechus Kirkaldy, 1902 (Heteroptera: Gerridae), with descriptions of two new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Duc, Tran Anh, Zettel, Herbert (2006): Notes on Eotrechus Kirkaldy, 1902 (Heteroptera: Gerridae), with descriptions of two new species. Zootaxa 1353: 39-51, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.174559
